# size

**Instance Property**

The dimensions of the annotation, in CSS pixels.

## Declaration

```swift
get size(): Size;
```

## Discussion

You can’t change the size of a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PlaceAnnotation].
